title: dhyAnamE enadu
sahitya:
dhyAnamE enadu manadu niraindadu candra bimba vadanam tanil dinam


anupallavi

  kAnta shaktiyai innAl ariyEn nAn (iru) kaN mayangi shAvEnO


caraNam    lOkamum adilE tOnrum indriya bhOgamum yAvum turandEn (viSaya) (kamala)
 mukhamum vasIkara nILiru vizhigaLum mOhana uruvum peyarum Aghavum
